verbose_text: For example, Bcl6 deficiency induced significantly elevated expression of both Prdm1 and Tbx21 in CD4 + T cells responding to FV infection, but it did not enhance CTL differentiation, arguing that Blimp1 may be necessary, but not sufficient, to drive the CTL program in CD4 + T cells.
evidence: expression of both Prdm1 and Tbx21
